trans-unit.source: A collection of toolbox items that have been categorized.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection contains items of type <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper> that are added and removed from an instance of the collection using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.Remove%2A> methods.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.

This allows the collection that is storing the toolbox items to provide notifications when properties like the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.CategoryName%2A> property are changed and methods like <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.Remove%2A> are used to change the contents of the collection.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> class.
The default name assigned to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection is an empty `string`.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> class with a specified name.
The name assigned to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection can be an empty `string`.
This is the value assigned by the default constructor, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.%23ctor%2A>.
The name of the toolbox category collection.
Adds a specified tool to the end of the toolbox category collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> item to add to the collection.
The tool is `null`.
Gets or sets the name of the toolbox category.
When set, the property provides a notification.
The name of the toolbox category.
Gets or sets the tool at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the tool to get or set.
The object at the specified index..
The index is not valid for the collection.
Occurs when a property value changes.
Removes the first occurrence of a specified tool from the toolbox category collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> item to remove from the collection.
`true` if the tool is successfully removed; otherwise, `false`.
This method also returns `false` if the tool was not found in the collection.
The tool is `null`.
Gets the tools in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target <xref href="System.Array"></xref>.
The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The index of the array at which the copying begins.
The array is `null`.
Gets the number of tools contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.System%23Collections%23ICollection%23SyncRoot%2A> property returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory>.
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> collection.
Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
At this position, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current> is undefined.

Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current>.
An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is no longer valid and its behavior is undefined.
The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator`1"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
Adds a tool to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The position into which the new element is inserted.
The zero-based index of the tool added to the collection.
The value is of a type that is not assignable to the implemented by the collection.
Removes all the tools from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> contains a specific tool.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The tool <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the collection.
`true` if the value is found in the ; otherwise, `false`.
The value is `null`.
Determines the index of a specific tool in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
The zero-based index of value if found in the ; otherwise, -1.
The value is `null`.
Inserts a tool into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> at the specified index.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, then `value` is appended to the end.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The tool added to the collection.
The index is not valid for the collection.
The value is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> is read-only, or it has a fixed size that has been exceeded.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> has a fixed size.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> is read-only.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the tool at the specified index.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
The zero-based index of the tool item to get or set.
The tool <xref href="System.Object"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific tool from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The tool <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref>.
Removes the tool at the specified index of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> collection.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The zero-based index of the tool item to remove.
The index is not valid for the collection.
